com.noctarius.borabora.builder.encoder.semantictag

Interface URIBuilder


  • public interface URIBuilder
    The URIBuilder interface is designed to be used with the TagSupport API.

    To use the builder, a GraphBuilder instance is required. The following example shows how to retrieve and use the builder's instance:

         GraphBuilder graphBuilder = writer.newGraphBuilder( output );
     graphBuilder.putTag(
         TagSupport.semanticTag( URIBuilder.class ).putURI( uri )
             .endSemanticTag() ).finishStream();

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TagBuilder putURI(URI uri)
      Writes the given uri value as a URI semantic tag.
      TagBuilder putURL(URL url)
      Writes the given URL value as a URI semantic tag.

    • Method Detail

      • putURI

        TagBuilder putURI(URI uri)
        Writes the given uri value as a URI semantic tag. The returned TagBuilder instance must be used to finalize the building by calling TagBuilder.endSemanticTag().
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI value to write as a URI
        Returns:
        the semantic tag finalizing TagBuilder

      • putURL

        TagBuilder putURL(URL url)
           throws URISyntaxException
        Writes the given URL value as a URI semantic tag. The url value is transformed to an URI instance first, then written. The returned TagBuilder instance must be used to finalize the building by calling TagBuilder.endSemanticTag().
        Parameters:
        url - the URL value to write as a URI
        Returns:
        the semantic tag finalizing TagBuilder
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - when the given URL is not a legal URI
